message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you consider that?
I understand your position, Bob, but the value of this product is quite high.  I could come down to $13,000. This is my final offer.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $12,500?
